If this doesn't relieve pain, a doctor may recommend thoracic outlet decompression surgery to release or remove the structures causing compression of the nerve or artery.",NINDS,Thoracic Outlet Syndrome
What is the outlook for Thoracic Outlet Syndrome ?,"The outcome for individuals with TOS varies according to type.
